basics.name: Jidraph Muigai
basics.label:
I have 10 years hands on experience in people management, customer service, relationship management,  training & development ( staff, Agents , Merchants and partners), talent acquisition, office administration, key account & partner support, supplier sourcing, operations management, channels and business development, training and development (Researching, content development, designing, developing, facilitating & evaluating training and development of training programs) all acquired in the telecommunications industry. 
My achievements include setting up a fully-fledged training team, development and documentation of key M-PESA processes, creation and development of Safaricom Lipa Na M-PESA Merchant Support section under M-PESA operations, and world class operations management efficiency that was voted Best in class within Safaricom.
